{{Description|Pure elemental life-forms composed of drifting Electro particles, as free and unbound as the butterflies they resemble.<br />A glittering Electro creature that is the product of rising and condensing elements, and which feeds off the ubiquitous power of Electro.<br />Could the flashing light in the dark night be the entrusted faith of a certain someone...|[[Archive]] Description}}
'''Electro Crystalfly''' is a species of Crystalfly that can be located throughout [[Inazuma]]. It can be found both as [[Wildlife]] and as a pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].

Outdoor creatures, as the name implies, can only be placed in outdoor spaces within the Serenitea Pot.

==Drops==
{{Card|Crystal Core|1}}

Catching one for the first time will add this creature's entry into your in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=298 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
* In the original Chinese text, the line in the Archive description, {{Lang|"Could the flashing light in the dark night be the entrusted faith of a certain someone..."|zh=在黑夜中跃动的电光，不知道是否寄托了谁的信仰...}} is a reference to a {{w|danmaku}} line derived from the anime series ''{{w|A Certain Scientific Railgun}}'' and its first opening theme song "{{w|Only My Railgun}}," popularized on the Chinese video platform BiliBili: {{Lang|''That spark glittering on your fingertips is my unshakeable faith for life! May my Railgun last for eternity!''|zh=你指尖跃动的电光，是我此生不灭的信仰，唯我超电磁炮永世长存！}}<ref name="Railgun">Moegirl Wiki: [https://zh.moegirl.org.cn/%E5%BE%A1%E5%9D%82%E7%BE%8E%E7%90%B4&variant=zh-hans Misaka Mikoto]</ref>
**The Japanese translation of this line ({{ja|黒夜を躍動する電光は、果たして誰の信仰を託されているのだろうか…}}) is similarly derived from the Japanese translation of the above Chinese danmaku: {{ja|君の指先を舞ってる電光は、私の一生変わらない信仰であり、このレールガンだけが永遠に生きてる！}}<ref name="Railgun" />
